title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.8 - Time of examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 22.8 - Time of examination

State Regulations

Literacy tests shall be administered as follows: (a) At local registration, on the days
designated for local registration of voters and on any additional days
designated by the superintendent of schools and at hours designated by the
superintendent of schools. (b) At
central registration, on the days when central registration is permitted and at
any time during business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
22.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
